Data preprocessing Module

This module contains the functions to preprocess the data.

scRNADataset

class scplan.DataWork.scRNA.scRNADataset(**args)
Parameters:

args -- Specify data path and file names with "data_path" and "target or simulation params "

:exception Raise exception if neither data path/file name nor simulation params is not provided

initialize(partial_rate, resolution=0)

Initialize the dataloader and generate partial label

Parameters:

partial_rate -- p to generate false labels among ambiguous pairs

Raises:

Exception -- Raise exception if data file is not found

Returns:

partial_Y: partial label for training cell_dic: Cell type for each label

computePrototype(data)

Compute prototype for each cell type

Parameters:

data -- Anndata object

Returns:

prototype for each cell type

HC_Tree_buildup(data)

Build up a hierarchical clustering tree based on the mean prototype of each cell type

Parameters:

data -- Input anndata object

Returns:

A clustering tree with nodes on each level

generateCandidateLabels(train_label, partial_rate, label_ref, resolution=0)

Base function for partial label generation

Parameters:

  • train_label -- Sample label

  • partial_rate -- Probability to generate a false positive within candidate set

  • label_ref -- Cell type corresponding to each label, just for

  • resolution -- Resolution for tree node merge

Returns:

partial label and None(For compatibility with Atlas dataset)

updateParams(param)

Update params based on input data, numclass, numfeatures and ambiguous cluster would be updated

Parameters:

param -- Param() objects

Returns:

updated param
